amendment.description: Amendment provides $20 million to the Community Development Block Grant Fund for use in States in the northeast impacted by January 1998 ice storms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed in part 2 of House Rept. 105-473, to provide $20 million to the Community Development Block Grant Fund for use in states in the northeast impacted by the January 1998 ice storms. The funds appropriated would be offset by a rescission of $20 million in the Section 8 Houseing Reserve Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Livingston amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
